mapper.sql: id, order_id, username, remarks, discounts_num, integral_num, order_begin_time, order_finish_time, distribution_man, adress, order_state, order_finish_state
mapper.insert:
insert into order_
id,
order_id,
username,
remarks,
discounts_num,
integral_num,
order_begin_time,
order_finish_time,
distribution_man,
adress,
order_state,
order_finish_state,

mapper.update:
update order_
order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
discounts_num = #{discountsNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
integral_num = #{integralNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_begin_time = #{orderBeginTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_finish_time = #{orderFinishTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
distribution_man = #{distributionMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
adress = #{adress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_state = #{orderState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_finish_state = #{orderFinishState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update order_ set order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, discounts_num = #{discountsNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, integral_num = #{integralNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_begin_time = #{orderBeginTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_finish_time = #{orderFinishTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, distribution_man = #{distributionMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, adress = #{adress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_state = #{orderState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_finish_state = #{orderFinishState,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select order_.order_id,order_.username, order_commodity.milk_tea_name,order_commodity.milk_tea_count, order_.remarks,order_.discounts_num,order_.integral_num, order_.order_begin_time,order_.order_finish_time, order_.distribution_man,order_.adress,order_.order_state, order_.order_finish_state from order_ , order_commodity where order_.order_id = order_commodity.order_id and order_.username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR};

select order_.order_id,order_.username,order_commodity.milk_tea_name, order_commodity.milk_tea_count,order_.remarks,order_.discounts_num, order_.integral_num,order_.order_begin_time,order_.order_finish_time, order_.distribution_man,order_.adress,order_.order_state,order_.order_finish_state from order_ , order_commodity where order_.order_id = order_commodity.order_id and order_.order_state = #{order_state,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and order_.username like CONCAT('%', #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
;
